description: The OPE_CASELOG_ADDL_INFO table is an extension of the OR management system log procedures (OR_LOG_ALL_PROC) table. It contains additional information about log procedures.

columns.name: OPE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the orders performed record.

columns.name: CASELOG_DATATYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Determines if this is a case or log procedure additional data record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Case


Log

columns.name: CASELOG_LOG_ID
columns.description: The log record ID when the procedure additional data item is for a log.

columns.name: CASELOG_CASE_ID
columns.description: The case record ID when the procedure additional data item is for a case.
